name: NFT Outbreak!
description:
Plot

NFT Outbreak is about being an NFT seller where you are trying to get many people to purchase your NFTs. You have to be very fast because it seems people are becoming less interested in NFT. Sell them while they are still hot!

Controls

AD - Movement

Spacebar - Launch Ball

Cheat Codes

R - Reset Ball

N - Next Level

B - Previous Level

H - Return to Start Menu

G - Game Over

Y - Win
